name: getLegoDetail
query:
WITH ImageData AS (
    SELECT 
        LegoId,
        JSON_ARRAYAGG(ImageUrl) AS images
    FROM Image
    WHERE LegoId = 1
    GROUP BY LegoId
)
SELECT
    l.Id AS id,
    l.Name AS name,
    l.Price AS price,
    JSON_ARRAYAGG(
        JSON_OBJECT(
            'id', t.Id,
            'name', t.Name
        )
    ) AS themes,
    JSON_MERGE(
        JSON_ARRAY(l.Image),
        COALESCE(id.images, JSON_ARRAY())
    ) AS image,
    l.Description AS description,
    l.ReleaseYear AS releaseYear,
    l.Number AS number
FROM
    Lego l
JOIN LegoTheme lt ON
    l.Id = lt.LegoId
JOIN Theme t ON
    t.Id = lt.ThemeId
LEFT JOIN ImageData id ON
    l.Id = id.LegoId
WHERE l.Id = 1
GROUP BY
    l.Id,
    l.Name,
    l.Price,
    l.Image,
    id.images;
